ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 20 shader cores x 114 FP32 ops/cycle/core = 2,280 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 20 shader cores x 228 FP16 ops/cycle/core = 4,560 FP16 ops/clock (2x FP32)
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 20 shader cores x 114 INT8 ops/cycle/core = 2,280 INT8 ops/clock (not AI-optimized)
ops_per_clock_notes.note: Valhall 2nd gen architecture. Graphics-focused GPU IP, not AI-optimized. No tensor cores.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (848 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: ARM Mali-G78 MP20 mobile GPU IP. 20 shader cores (MP20 config, max 24). Valhall 2nd gen architecture. 7nm Samsung process. Used in Google Tensor (Pixel 6). Graphics-focused, not AI-optimized (no tensor cores). For mobile gaming, photography, AR/VR.
